## DateTimePickerOptions interface

Defintion of datetime picker component options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimePickerOptions<TPicker = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClasses?](./datetime.datetimepickeroptions.cssclasses.md) | [DateTimePickerCssClasses](./datetime.datetimepickercssclasses.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Css classes for date time picker |
|  [defaultPeriod?](./datetime.datetimepickeroptions.defaultperiod.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Name of default period for picker that is displayed |
|  [pickerPeriodsDefinition?](./datetime.datetimepickeroptions.pickerperiodsdefinition.md) | Dictionary&lt;Type&lt;TPicker&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Definition of types for each period type for picker |
|  [pickerPeriodsOrder?](./datetime.datetimepickeroptions.pickerperiodsorder.md) | string\[\] \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Order of pickers, it's possible use less pickers as is defined in pickerPeriodsDefinition for example 'month,year' |
